review: I didn't fully understand what I was getting. I thought I'd be able to watch current TV shows without paying. Even signing up for the 30 day Prime trial, I still don't receive current TV shows. I recommend Prime with fire TV or you have to pay for everything you watch.
author: Niccol Valentine

review: Cool device but did not include as many "old" series for free as I thought it would.  Surprised that many over decade old still cost to view!  Also could not view recent episodes of local tv shows (NBC, CBS, ABC etc) as I was told you could by a sales person.  Would love to see it include ID channel.Screensavers are amazing.
author: S. Reeder

review: Enjoy watching my Prime Lists and especially Listening to my MP3 Music from Prime

review: No issues. Very nice technology. Hope I can figure out how to integrate it with other remotes. I'm up to 3.
